title: Face value
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Accidents

description: Explores the lives of three facially disfigured individuals in a sensitive and moving series of interviews. Discusses the meaning of beauty, the value of physical appearances in society and the importance of every human being.
